title: Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Horizon Health Services in Dec 2022
Interview Descriptions: Two interviews and a case study. Interviewed with one manager and then head of counselors for company. Both interviews about 1 hour. Must exhibit professionalism and ask your own questions at the end
Interview Questions: - Strengths/weaknesses - Relations between mental health and substance abuse - Self care - Therapy modalities

title: Behavior Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Horizon Health Services (Buffalo, NY) in Jul 2022
Interview Descriptions: The waiting process for a call back after the interviews was dreadful, patience is key. They emailed back with an offer of a position. The interview itself was back to back for the first and second and it was less than 40 mins each time.
Interview Questions: How would you react to a co-worker doing something you know is wrong?

title: Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Horizon Health Services (New York, NY) in Mar 2022
Interview Descriptions: The interview discussed SW experience, classes and what you would do in certain situations. Very informative interview and the staff member was very friendly and welcoming. Discussed experience as well and questions such as "why horizon?"
Interview Questions: Why Horizon, How comfortable are you with diversity, tell me about your school experience

title: Associate Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Horizon Health Services
Interview Descriptions: It was a very detailed, scenario-specific, interview that comprised of background, interests, future objectives, and also provided space for the interviewee to ask questions. It looked at individual strengths and weaknesses also.
Interview Questions: Tell me a little bit about yourself?

title: Behavioral Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Horizon Health Services
Interview Descriptions: Nothing unbelievably extensive, but a pretty thorough interview. A lot of specific questions about what you would do in certain situations with clients and how you communicate with people. Practice and come prepared.
Interview Questions: How would you handle a client wanting to hang out with you after they left the facility?

title: Care Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Horizon Health Services
Interview Descriptions: I have 5 interviews with different pll. The team is welcoming and kind. They discuss the agency & department as a whole. Discussed the pros and cons. There was a drug test and it normally starts at 18$
Interview Questions: Why horizon health services for CC?

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Horizon Health Services
Interview Descriptions: Very quick and easy. Great communication and environment. Interview process was pretty simple and they did a good job of making you feel welcome. The company seems very great to work for.
Interview Questions: why do you want to work for Horizon Health?

title: Mental Health Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Horizon Health Services (Buffalo, NY) in May 2019
Interview Descriptions: Very efficient, professional, warm and inviting. I wanted the job even more after the interview. The hiring supervisor was direct with the question and allowed for mine too. I recommend this interview style for anyone to use.
Interview Questions: What is your area of practice

title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Horizon Health Services (Buffalo, NY) in Jun 2018
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was in quick but very in depth.  They did their background checks.  This is a great company to work for, expect to work hard, but most managers show their appreciation.
Interview Questions: If you could be an animal what would you be?

title: Clinical Supervisor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Horizon Health Services (Buffalo, NY)
Interview Descriptions: Took about 3 weeks from applying online, phone screen, 1st and 2nd in-person interviews. Interviews were straight forward and professional. Offered higher pay than initially discussed based on experience and fit of position.
Interview Questions: What drew you to apply for this position? Describe your supervisory style. Describe a challenging incident and how you handled it.

title: IT Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Horizon Health Services
Interview Descriptions: Had a phone call with recruiter. Had Technical and Behavioral questions. They were looking for a summer intern with computer skills. Better to know more about the company before interview.
Interview Questions: What programming languages you're good at?

title: Treatment Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Horizon Health Services (Sanborn, NY) in Aug 2016
Interview Descriptions: phone interview then two face to face interviews. Very professional. Total process took three weeks. Background check, drug testing after job offer. Once offered job started one week later.
Interview Questions: why do you want to work for horizon
